coded_answer.p: I would like to thank you for your letter you recently sent me concerning the competitoncompetition offor two weeks at Camp California in the U.S.A.
This augustAugust I will start a new job so the only possible month for me to join in the Campcamp is July. I hope this will cause no problems.

I am glad that you offer for accommodation not only in tents but also in log cabins. Because I am a light sleeper and have problems with my back I prefer to sleep in a log cabin with a comfortable bed.

Although it was not easy to choose two activities from your list I decided to do Singing and Surfingsinging and surfing. It is difficult to say how goodwell I can sing but I really like it and I think I am not too bad. I never didnever triedhave never tried Surfingsurfing in my life but I am a very good Snowboardersnowboarder and this could be an advantage.
I hope I gavehave given you all the informationsinformation you need. There is something I would like to know from you.
Should I bring some special clothes (surfing) with me? How much money do you think I have to change and is there ais it possible to get more (bank)?
I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Last saturdaySaturday evening I spenthad a wonderful time. The motor bikemotorbike club ofin our town organized a pop concert. A girlfriend of a member of the club asked me if I would like to help at the information desk. I did not hesitate one moment.

The only thing I had to do was solvingto solve the different problems of the guestsaudience and just beingbe there if they havehad any questions. Some people came from Germany, some from Austria and some came from England or the U.S.A.
Talking English with the people from England or the U.S.A. was wonderful. They were all very kind and with some of them I spent the rest of the evening and also the following day.

That I reachedearned a lot of money for doing something I like very much was very niceIt was very nice that I earned a lot of money for doing something I like very much but the most important thing for me was meeting people, having fun and using the English language. I will never forget this evening.
